title: Novoland: The Castle in the Sky 2
overview: Powerful forces are searching for the only daughter of Feng Tian Yi and Yi Fu Ling in a plot to urusp power by holding her hostage. Feng Ru Che's Â father once told her, don't tell a man that he's handsome because she might just fall for him. Feng Ru Che who represents the next generation falls into a fated romance with Xue Jing Kong.
